name: Rising
description: Battle through hordes of enemies to find the source of a hellish invasion fueled by an ancient artifact.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, Shader 2.0+ Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 3 Ghz dual-core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, Shader 2.0+ Storage: 500 MB available space
